title: Land for sale at Handapangoda
details:
Seven acre land with mixed cultivation with an extent of Seven acres available for immediate sale.
Location - 05 Km from Poruwadanda junction towards Handapangoda off Horana / Ratnapura road.
Access road - 30 ft. wide. Motorable for. Heavy vehicles such as Containers, Earth moving equipment etc.
Road frontage - 50 meters (aprox.). fairly flat land ideal for an Industry, Factory complex etc. Presently less density of population in the vicinity. Fast developing as an Industrial estate. Selling price Rs. One Hundred and ten million. (offers can be considered).
